EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_GE Power Services Workshop_Q217.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the Pivotal | GE Power Services Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud-Native Workshop, hosted by Pivotal.
Before arriving on May 17, make sure that you’ve installed the Cloud Foundry CLI <[[https://docs.cloudfoundry.org/cf-cli/install-go-cli.html?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTWpOa09XUTNNRFUxWWpJMiIsInQiOiJMcUx4K1ZiU3JqbTRrRkJJVWlFUDduejRlcmkzU1RSZnVLMmVcL3BSeHBtMVljXC8xVGJHS1R3NmQ1bjdEWXFDWXdubVg3RmR5Y1wvckFaSktZUUN0V0ZPZz09In0%3D#installer]]> (versions exist for Windows, Mac, and Linux) on your laptop. Also, be sure to have a development environment handy, as we’ll be slinging some code together.
Pivotal will take care of providing the initial source code, and hosting environment. If you’d like to read up on Cloud Foundry <[[http://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-10/concepts/index.html?mkt_tok=eyJpIjoiTWpOa09XUTNNRFUxWWpJMiIsInQiOiJMcUx4K1ZiU3JqbTRrRkJJVWlFUDduejRlcmkzU1RSZnVLMmVcL3BSeHBtMVljXC8xVGJHS1R3NmQ1bjdEWXFDWXdubVg3RmR5Y1wvckFaSktZUUN0V0ZPZz09In0%3D]]>, please do so. But don’t worry if you don’t get to it, we’ll do an engaging deep dive together on the 17th.
Date: May 17-18, 2017
Time:
9:00AM to 11:00AM
Location: GE Atlanta 4200 Windy Hill Rd Atlanta, GA, 30339 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/GE+Power/@33.9133665,-84.4589969,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x88f511c0e1e8a29d:0x50e8ae86031157a0!8m2!3d33.9133665!4d-84.4568082]]>)
We look forward to seeing you there.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at mwright@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mwright@pivotal.io]]>.
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/GE-Power-Services-Workshop.html]]>
